title: Macron will attend World Cup in Russia if France makes semi-finals
text:
May 24, 2018 / 8:17 PM / Updated 32 minutes ago Macron will attend World Cup in Russia if France makes semi-finals Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
ST PETERSBURG, Russia (Reuters) - President Emmanuel Macron on Thursday said he would travel to Russia this summer for the soccer World Cup if the French team made it to the semi-finals. Russian President Vladimir Putin (R) and his French counterpart Emmanuel Macron attend a signing ceremony after the talks in St. Petersburg, Russia May 24, 2018. REUTERS/Grigory Dukor
Campaign groups including Human Rights Watch have pressed Macron to boycott the tournament over Russiaâ€™s involvement in the Syrian conflict.
Macron was speaking at a joint news conference with Russian President Vladimir Putin. Reporting by Michel Rose; Writing by Richard Lough; editing by John Stonestreet
